title: Bit Toggle Function
description: This function toggles a specific bit of a given BYTE input based on the position provided. It takes a BYTE input value and an integer representing the bit position that needs to be toggled. The function utilizes a bitwise shift and XOR operation to achieve the toggling.
name: BIT_TOGGLE_B

input.name: IN
input.description: The input BYTE value whose bit is to be toggled.

input.name: POS
input.description: The position of the bit to be toggled, where 0 represents the least significant bit.

return_value.description: The resulting BYTE value after toggling the specified bit.
